history.proof: intros p. unfold pl_produit_path_incl_def_3. intros n m plp Hincl Hlen1 Hlen2 Hess. qauto depth: 4 l: on use: pl_path_incl_nil, pl_produit_path_incl_2, pl_product_0_invar_essence unfold: pl_produit, pl_path_product inv: pl_tl_length, pl_path_incl.

original: intros p. unfold pl_produit_path_incl_def_3. intros n m plp Hincl Hlen1 Hlen2 Hess. apply pl_produit_path_incl_1_5 in Hincl. destruct Hincl as [Hdef0 Hdef1]. apply Hdef0 in Hincl. apply Hdef1 in Hincl. apply Hincl in Hess as Hexists. destruct Hexists as [plp0 [plp1 [Hproduct [Hincl0 Hincl1]]]]. exists plp0, plp1. auto.
